Pattern.name: Mediator
Pattern.Desc: Define an object that encapsulates how a set of objects interact. Mediator promotes loose coupling by keeping objects from referring to each other explicitly, and it lets you vary their interaction independently.

Node.name: Mediator
Node.Desc: Defines an interface for communicating with Colleague objects.

Node.name: ConcreteMediator
Node.Desc: Implements cooperative behavior by coordinating Colleague objects, and knows and maintains its colleagues.

Node.name: Colleague
Node.Desc: Each Colleague class knows its Mediator object. Each colleague communicates with its mediator whenever it would have otherwise communicated with another colleague.
